turns.speaker: client
turns.text: ASSISTANT I want to order a COFFEE DRINK from PEETS

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, do you want to order from the nearest store?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, the nearest store is Giants Carisle 698 Downingtown Pike West Chester, PA. Choose another location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No use this location

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want hot or ice coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hot

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want a Seasonal Beverage, Espresson Beverage, or Brewed Coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Seasonal Beverage

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want Golden Caffè Latte, Golden Cold Brew Fog Latte, or Golden Matcha Latte

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What is Golden Matcha Latte?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Golden Matcha Latte is Authentic Matcha green tea, delicately steamed with milk, honey, and turmeric. Do you want this?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, do you want small, medium, or large size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Large

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, do you want 2% Milk, Whole Milk, Non-Fat Milk, Almond Milk, Soy Milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Almond Milk

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, you want one large hot Golden Matcha Latte with Almond Milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How do you want to pay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pay with my PEETS account

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, coffee has been ordered and will be ready to pick up at Giants Carisle 698 Downingtown Pike West Chester, PA and you will receive a text when it is ready.
